content: I made the simple cryptoscreener. At the moment the screener are displaying pairs with USDT, BTC and ETH. The site collects pairs data, news and draws the pattern on the chart.Please let me know if you have questions/comments/suggestions.https://cmarket.infoUPDATE.ToDo List:1. Dark mode2. Filters for the News tab3. Auto hints for search field4. Automated refreshing (prices and charts)5. Need to edit "Time", "Ticker" and "Source" columns on all pages6. Need to update "Volume" column, make it black.7. Page with explantion of signals and indicators8. Option to make larger font on the site9. Custom tickers for the main page10. Notifications as option11. Modular page (Like for one coin or token, for example the main page for BTC only)

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: I'm glad to see that you are updating and accepting the suggestions you get here. I will not read all the previous comments again I don't know if it has already been suggested, but I would suggest that you decide on a more precise purpose for the page. I'm mostly thinking of the news section, which mostly dominates and is everywhere. every blog has tickers with news, mostly taken from some of the big sources. I think it's almost completely unnecessary for you because few of your visitors will come for the news in addition to so many better choices. for what you basically offer, it is not crucial that users also have a news ticker. if you really want to keep it, maybe move it to the bottom of the page, to a less prominent placeMaybe you can add some better navigation when we choose any other pair. above graph and below I still have news, but I have no choice for another pair, I have to use the back button.
